text: Anarsia eburnella is a moth in the family Gelechiidae. It was described by Hugo Theodor Christoph in 1887. It is found in Turkmenistan, Iran and Afghanistan.Anarsia at Markku Savela's Lepidoptera and Some Other Life Forms The length of the forewings is about 8 mm. The forewings are bone yellow and the hindwings are light grey.Mémoires sur les lépidoptères 3: 122 ==References== eburnella Category:Moths described in 1887 Category:Moths of Asia
title: Anarsia eburnella
